visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly temperature data for a year. Additionally, specify custom colors for the series and configure other settings such as chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes for better readability. The data series represents monthly temperature data for a year, with a custom color applied to the series. Additional configurations include settings for chart margins, background color, and legend styling. The navigation button options are also specified to control the appearance of navigation buttons within the chart.
